name: Crazy Wrestlers Game - Free 8-bit Pixel Retro Fight-ing Games
name_original: Crazy Wrestlers Game - Free 8-bit Pixel Retro Fight-ing Games
description:
Crazy Wrestlers are mad and about to take a punch! Go as far as possible by punching your way through the polls. Get the highest score you can and earn awesome medals. Compete with other players in Game Center. Share your score with friends on Facebook and Twitter.

Game Features:

- 8-bit art style and retro look
- Play with just a tap
- Very fast game play
- Not easy and challenging, but hardly impossible
- Game Center integrated for more fun
- Great for everyone: if you’d like to get some stress out, or just love old school and mini games, or you’re just a kid – Crazy Wrestlers Fight will be great for you
- The best of all, it’s FREE: no hidden in-app purchases, everything unlocked at no price

You may think it’s just another running, flying, jumping, or endless race game. But this nice tiny indie game is a bit different…
